summary: An ordinance relating to the valuation, for tax purposes, of the leasehold interest of the Metropolitan Building Company, a corporation, in the property commonly known as the "University Grounds", in the City of Seattle; directing the Corporation Counsel to take and prosecute any and all necessary appeals from any adverse actions, orders or decision s in respect to the petition of the City of Seattle asking an increase in the said valuation of said leasehold and declaring an emergency.
